data.body: {"results":" RxNLP - Natural Language Processing and Text Mining APIs & Tools | Remedies for Taming Text Skip to main content Home API Documentation Resources Plans Contact [Home] Main menu Home API Documentation Resources Plans Contact APIs and Endpoints We provideÂ Text Mining and Natural Language ProcessingÂ REST APIs that can be used in various application domains such as in manufacturing applications, health care applications, e-commerce systems andÂ many others.Â We offer basic text mining APIs such asÂ n-gram countingÂ as well as advanced Data SummarizationÂ APIs such as sentence and micro-text clustering, topic finding and extractionÂ and opinion summarization. You can easilyÂ tryÂ the APIs at any time over the cloud. We also provide several hosting options for these APIs.Â  Read more about Obtain Your Developer API Key To try orÂ start consuming ourÂ APIsÂ over the cloud, you would first need to register for aÂ mashapeÂ account. Mashape manages API access, billing and access limits. Next, you would need to subscribe to the planÂ of interest from ourÂ list of APIs. Once you are subscribed, theÂ API keysÂ would be available via the mashape website and you should be ready to start consumingÂ the APIs. Read more about API Usage Documentation Counting NGramsÂ  Computing Text SimilarityÂ  Clustering Sentences Summarizing Opinions Finding Topics in Text Â  Read more about API for Clustering Sentences & Micro-Texts TheÂ ClusterSentencesÂ APIÂ endpoint clusters sentences (e.g. sentences from multiple news articles) or short texts (e.g. Tweets andÂ Facebook Status) into logical groups. This endpoint not only produces meaningful clusters, it also provides meaningful topic cues which would make analysis of the clusters much easier than not having any labels or topics.Â  Read more about API for Computing Similarity Between Texts TheÂ TextSimilarityÂ endpoint computesÂ surface similarity between two pieces of textÂ (long or short) using well known measures such asÂ Jaccard,Â DiceÂ andÂ Cosine. Determining similarity between texts is crucial to many modern day applications such as finding similarity between tweets in order to group similar tweets together, linking similar entitiesÂ or even finding topics that are almost identical. Read more about API for N-Gram Generation and Counting The NGramCounter API endpoint generates n-grams and the frequency counts of the n-grams based on the text provided and the required n-gram size. The n-grams and its frequency are returned in the descending order of frequency. Read more about Getting Started API Reference API ClusterSentences Sentence Clustering Tool TextSimilarity API Computing Text Similarity NGramCounter Pricing Hosting Plans API Limit Data Summarization API More tags API List API Hosting Options Obtain API Key info@rxnlp.com Technical Support Contact Page API Reference Programming Resources FacebookÂ  Â  Â Â GoogleÂ  Â  Â Â GitHubÂ  Â  Â Â MashapeÂ   "}

response.body: {"results":" RxNLP - Natural Language Processing and Text Mining APIs & Tools | Remedies for Taming Text Skip to main content Home API Documentation Resources Plans Contact [Home] Main menu Home API Documentation Resources Plans Contact APIs and Endpoints We provideÂ Text Mining and Natural Language ProcessingÂ REST APIs that can be used in various application domains such as in manufacturing applications, health care applications, e-commerce systems andÂ many others.Â We offer basic text mining APIs such asÂ n-gram countingÂ as well as advanced Data SummarizationÂ APIs such as sentence and micro-text clustering, topic finding and extractionÂ and opinion summarization. You can easilyÂ tryÂ the APIs at any time over the cloud. We also provide several hosting options for these APIs.Â  Read more about Obtain Your Developer API Key To try orÂ start consuming ourÂ APIsÂ over the cloud, you would first need to register for aÂ mashapeÂ account. Mashape manages API access, billing and access limits. Next, you would need to subscribe to the planÂ of interest from ourÂ list of APIs. Once you are subscribed, theÂ API keysÂ would be available via the mashape website and you should be ready to start consumingÂ the APIs. Read more about API Usage Documentation Counting NGramsÂ  Computing Text SimilarityÂ  Clustering Sentences Summarizing Opinions Finding Topics in Text Â  Read more about API for Clustering Sentences & Micro-Texts TheÂ ClusterSentencesÂ APIÂ endpoint clusters sentences (e.g. sentences from multiple news articles) or short texts (e.g. Tweets andÂ Facebook Status) into logical groups. This endpoint not only produces meaningful clusters, it also provides meaningful topic cues which would make analysis of the clusters much easier than not having any labels or topics.Â  Read more about API for Computing Similarity Between Texts TheÂ TextSimilarityÂ endpoint computesÂ surface similarity between two pieces of textÂ (long or short) using well known measures such asÂ Jaccard,Â DiceÂ andÂ Cosine. Determining similarity between texts is crucial to many modern day applications such as finding similarity between tweets in order to group similar tweets together, linking similar entitiesÂ or even finding topics that are almost identical. Read more about API for N-Gram Generation and Counting The NGramCounter API endpoint generates n-grams and the frequency counts of the n-grams based on the text provided and the required n-gram size. The n-grams and its frequency are returned in the descending order of frequency. Read more about Getting Started API Reference API ClusterSentences Sentence Clustering Tool TextSimilarity API Computing Text Similarity NGramCounter Pricing Hosting Plans API Limit Data Summarization API More tags API List API Hosting Options Obtain API Key info@rxnlp.com Technical Support Contact Page API Reference Programming Resources FacebookÂ  Â  Â Â GoogleÂ  Â  Â Â GitHubÂ  Â  Â Â MashapeÂ   "}

data.name: 1. HTML2Text

data.description: Compute similarity between two units of texts using Jaccard, Cosine and Dice similarity measures. Can be used to find similar queries, ads, Tweets, product listings, documents, etc. This endpoint is language neutral. For more info, please check http://www.rxnlp.com/api-reference/text-similarity-api-reference/

payload.name: TextSimilarity

data.name: 2. TextSimilarity

data.description: Generate counts words or n-grams in descending order. N represents the required n-gram size.

response.name: Counts of N-Grams
response.description: Generated 3-Grams (trigrams) in descending order for the text " I love rainy days. How I wish it was raining ! How I wish it was snowing !"
